2024.title: Global IoT revenues to reach $1.38 trillion in 2024
2024.description: Statista projects global IoT revenues will hit approximately $1.38 trillion in 2024, up 18% year‑on‑year.

2024.title: Automotive segment drives $494 billion of IoT revenue in 2024
2024.description: Automotive IoT is the largest vertical, generating ~ $494 billion—or one‑third of total global IoT revenue in 2024.

2024.title: Industrial IoT market valued between $289B–483B in 2024
2024.description: Estimates vary: IMARC places IIoT at USD 289 billion, while Grand View Research estimates USD 483 billion in 2024.

2024.title: Global IIoT market size ~USD 438.9 billion in 2024
2024.description: Precedence Research reports the industrial IoT market at USD 438.9 billion in 2024, with expected growth to USD 2.15 trillion by 2034.

2024.title: IIoT CAGR forecasts range from 7% to 23%
2024.description: CAGR projections for IIoT: Grand View sees 23.3% (2025–30), Precedence 17.2% (2024–34), IndustryARC 6.7% (2024–30).

2024.title: Consumer & industrial IoT growing across segments
2024.description: Statista: Industrial IoT ~$325 billion; consumer IoT ~$192 billion; smart finance ~ $132 billion in 2024.
